name: monacolin-J-acid:(S)-2-methylbutanoyl-[acp] (S)-2-methylbutanoyltransferase
definition: Monacolin J acid + (S)-2-Methylbutanoyl-[acp] <=> Lovastatin acid + Acyl-carrier protein
comment: Acy-carrier protein is acp domain of LOVF [KO:K20984].
